feature_model.name: MyRoot
feature_model.feature_tree: :r MyRoot (f_MyRoot) :m MyFeature (f_MyFeature) :o opt (f_opt) :o MyFeature2 (f_MyFeature2) :g [1, 1] : Light (f_Light) : Dark (f_Dark) : None (f_None) :g [1, 1] : Green (f_Green) : Blue (f_Blue) : Red (f_Red)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_Dark or f_MyRoot constraint_2:~f_Dark or f_Green
